page.title: 16Attitudes
page.content: As one might expect from people in an area such as this,they regard the natural environment as very precious and wish to see its perpetual preservation.Many of the area's inhabitants are attached to various organisations and associations which reflect their environmental interests. These include the R.S.P.B.,the R.S.P.C.A.,Green Peace,The National Trust and The World Wildlife Fund.One person belonged to two similar associations a great distance away_The Jersey Wildlife Trust and The Devon Donkey Trust.The rugged terrain engenders a hardy breed of people but it is nevertheless one which is sensitive to the world around it.
